block.p: STEELE-Ken. The New York City Department of Mental Health, Mental Retardation and Alcoholism Services offers condolences to family and friends as we all deeply mourn the loss of this esteemed mental health consumer leader, advocate and journalist whose vision to reduce stigma toward the mentally ill inspired countless others. Services Thursday, October 12th, 12pm The Prospect Cemetery, Prospect, Ct. 203758-4668. Contributions, in lieu of flowers, to New York City Voices 464 9th St., Brooklyn, NY 11215.
